title: Handle a Station Elevator Outage
description: An elevator at a subway station is out of service, impacting accessibility. The control center must manage the response.

tasks.description: Receive an alert that an elevator at a specific station is offline.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent is notified of the accessibility issue.

tasks.description: Post a service alert on the website and app, informing passengers that the station is not currently accessible.
Create a high-priority work order for the elevator maintenance team.
Arrange for a temporary shuttle bus to connect the inaccessible station to the next nearest accessible station.
tasks.expected_outcome: A bus bridge is set up to maintain accessibility.
